title: Rocky Terrain

movement: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber. Gain 1 Timber die.

title: Forest Boar
movement: 'Hey Keel, could you peek your head in there and see if it's empty (xxCOMBAT)?' If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character taking the test is Weary.

title: Abandoned Mine
movement: Scattered mines from old Amber Hand outposts can still be found in the forest. Gain 1 Ore die.

title: Sudden Storm
movement: 'Stop whining and keep moving! You want to freeze to death?' Take 2 Discord.

title: Radiant Fernbrake
movement: The pale red plant has a vast number of uses. However, it is very difficult to harvest correctly (xxLORE). If passed, gain 1 Luxury die.

title: Eldritch Energy
movement: Ripples of magic ebb out from some chaotic source deeper within the forest (xxLORE). If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: A Failed Defense
movement: The casualties of a long forgotten war echo their pain and anger into the forest. One character at this location is Exhausted.

title: Battle Plans
movement: The Sunriders keep one eye on the horizon. You may discard one Security threat card.

title: Dragon Shrine
movement: The influence of the great wyrm is everywhere. You may take 1 Discord to gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location.

title: Shame To Anger
movement: 'Why can't you just trust my judgement?' If there is a Frustrated character at this location, they become Angry.

title: Looking West
movement: At the far edge of the plains the Empire lies in wait (xxTACTICS). If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making this test becomes Angry.

title: Favors Returned
movement: You may spend 1 Mana to gain 2 Food dice.

title: Arban's Sunset Ride
movement: 'Keep up! Keep up (xxCOMMAND)!' If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making this test becomes Weary.

title: Taichu's Test
movement: Taichu, the greatest of the Sunrider's military commanders, is the key to Arban's support (xxCOMMAND). If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Rousing Speech
movement: 'Let us not lose sight of the will of the Empire! They seek to divide us (xxRAPPORT)!' If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Moonrider Envoy
movement: Take 2 Discord if Ile is in play.

title: Horse Games
movement: 'Well... here goes nothing... (xxCOMBAT)'. If passed, gain 1 Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making this test becomes Exhausted.

title: Following Ley Lines
movement: Gain a number of xxMANA dice equal to Sorcery.

title: Secretive Magic
movement: Optional: Test (Lore 2). Success: +2 xxFORTUNE dice. Failure: +3 xxDISCORD.

title: Verdant Fields
movement: The springs are lush with life, and all is well in the world. Time for rest.

title: Keeper of Swords
movement: I'm not sure if your fighting spirit is up to the task? Sad, really.
fail1: Test (Command 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: xxCOMMAND

If Thea is at a Red Bank location, may add a Mission Progress die there.
Despair is thick in the air. Take 2 Discord.
'Justice for Castor! Justice for Castor!' Take 1 Discord for each Violent Locals obstacle in play.
The Order of the Eye is mysterious, but occasionally helpful. Add a Mana die to the pool.
'Sorry to interrupt you, but I've received an urgent notice from Lily Manor (xxCOMMAND).' If passed, may move one character from this location to any Faction location.
'Yes. Yes! Yes, I hear you. You understand I am on your side here? (xxCOMMAND).' If failed, one character making this test is Frustrated.
'Castor's cousin was behind this. What should we do with him (xxCOMMAND)?' If passed, may pull a Mission Progress die to the current location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.
There is no reasoning with people who are angry and afraid (xxCOMMAND). If passed, may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location. Otherwise, subtract 2 Mission Progress.

There are numerous signs of Imperial activity, but nothing substantial yet (xxSURVIVAL). If passed, may exchange a Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, one character making test is Exhausted.
'Keep. Up (xxSURVIVAL)'. If passed, may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.
The source of the magic has been found, but can it be weakened (xxLORE)? If passed, add 2 Progress to Veil Ward threat.
Conserving magical energy is not easy (xxLORE). If failed, remove one Mana die at the House of Lavender.
Aided by a team of guards, raids are conducted against Sparrow Keep (xxCOMBAT). If passed, add an Ore die to Sparrow Keep. Otherwise, one character making this test is Wounded.
'Press the attack! While we have the initiative!' Once unleashed, rage can only intensify (xxCOMBAT). Otherwise, one character making this test is Exhausted.

pass1: Oh my dear Thea, surely you have more pressing matters at home to attend to!
fail2: Attach to The Wrenhouse.

pass1: The Empire has dug their heels in very well.
fail2: Attach to Beetle Burrough.

title: xxRAPPORT
pass1: And finally, sign here. And here. And one more time... here.
fail2: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: xxTACTICS
pass1: How can you say that when such problems are happening in your own backyard?
fail2: xxACTIVATE Subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: xxTHIEVERY
pass1: It will take careful work to overcome this.
fail2: xxACTIVATE Subtract 2 Mission Progress.

title: xxTACTICS
pass1: And yet this is the first we've heard of these plans? How can you help us defend against the coming threats?
fail2: xxACTIVATE Take 1 Discord.

title: xxRAPPORT
pass1: You... amuse me. Let's play!
fail2: xxCIRCLE When the Sapphire Djinn is burned, add 2 progress to the Veil Ward threat.
fail3: xxACTIVATE Take 2 Discord and add 1 Mana die to pool.

fail2: May take 1 Discord to move a character at this location to any other location.
Peace at home is peace abroad. If Stability is higher than 2, may reroll any Mission Progress dice at this location.
'If you'll allow me to speak candidly - this threat is far greater than you realize. I have been sent to help you.' You may take 2 Discord to add a Mana die to Goldspike.
'Why, but of course. Tonight is a night to be merry! Worries should be left at the door. A small little town like Red Bank can cause no disturbance here.' One character at this location is Angry.
'Every city is of importance. Lily Manor will do everything in its power to aid Red Bank. Any kingdom, large or small, is deserving of peace.' Draw two asset cards.
'Thank you for these wonderful gifts! Let us enjoy them (xxRAPPORT)!' If failed, remove a Luxury die from the Hall of Brass.
'I'm not as think as you drunk I am (xxRAPPORT)!' If failed, reroll Mission Progress at this location.
'You don't say? And who said that, exactly (xxRAPPORT)?' If passed, draw the top asset card. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

Not everyone in the Empire is content with the Autarch's rule. Akilah, a servant in the Subtect's envoy, may be a useful ally (xxRAPPORT). If passed, add a Mission Progress die to this location. Otherwise, one character making this test is Frustrated.
Crooked yellowed teeth and sinister intent. Too much time in Beetle Burrough isn't good for your health (xxTHIEVERY). If failed, take 1 Discord.
'Thea, this magic points directly back to the Autarch. Perhaps we can find a source (xxTHIEVERY)?' If passed, add 2 Progress to the Veil Ward threat.
'Wait, what's this residue on your glass (xxTHIEVERY)?' If failed, one character taking this test is Wounded.
Contacts in the Wrenhouse are difficult to uncover (xxDISGUISE). If failed, one character making this test is Exhausted.
'Only communicate using the Veil Ward - never out in the open (xxDISGUISE).' If failed, take 1 Discord.
The hooded figures looked at Menas carefully, judging the wisdom of his suggestion (xxTACTICS). If passed, may reroll any Mission Progress at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

Menas frowned, looking back at Fuscus with a confused expression. They would need to go over the plan one more time (xxTACTICS). If passed, may exchange a Mission Progress die at this location. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.
